reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Loved the mouse, 400dpi feels great wireless, annoyed because I ordered the white one and received the matte black one, really not a huge deal, but silly on Amazon's part as the white was more available and cheaper(on top of fitting ny needs better as well) but didn't have time or wanna spend the money to ship it back and wait longer. Mouse is brilliant regardless of color, my issue is with the retailer 👀

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WAY better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I love this mouse, went from a G502 to the model o and loved it, happy gaming!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mouse is Amazing
reviews.reviewText: I previously bought a cheap, “ergonomic” mouse but the sensitivity on it was terrible and didn’t pick up movement well at all. This mouse was a great investment and the sensitivity is perfect. Only the is that the shape sometimes hurts the bottom of my palm after long use but if you get a good mouse pad this should be no issue. I say get it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars near perfect mouse for everything
reviews.reviewText: a very light and precise mouse, i use it for work and for both csgo and league of legends, my previous mouse the roccat kone aimo was bulky, heavy and with multiple buttons that were very lighly pressed, quite annoying to be fair, but it was a great mouse nonetheless.Now for the model o from glorious gaming, is a step up in my case, the mouse is super light and hovers over my mouse pad, is comfortable enough to grip on it, and has best amount of buttons, tho my biggest complains are 2, the battery life is absolutely atrocious, 2 to 3 matches in league of legends are enough to drain the battery in a day, for a work session maybe in 3 to 4 days, and my second complain are the clicking of the right button, it almost feels like is getting stuck with something, i opened and cleaned the mouse multiple times and still haven't found what's going on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wireless gaming mouse
reviews.reviewText: My son loves this gaming mouse. Just received a week ago so k can’t say much for durability but everything else works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gaming mouse
reviews.reviewText: Showed up on time and my son loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I expected
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: 4 months in and I still have had no issues, still the best mouse I've had. Id recommend it to anyone.Absolutely no issues what so ever. I love this mouse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mouse was a disappointment
reviews.reviewText: I have heard so many good things about this mouse but that was not the case for me. It took 2 different times while i had to return the 1st defective mouse and got the 2nd one to just come back defective aswell. The movement is not aligned correctly. It skips all over the place. Just awful experience. I was looking forward to this mouse but oh well. Time to go back to the Logitech Pro Wireless. Btw i have video proof of the lag and how bad the alignment is if any Glorious members want to see for themselves.

Really good mouse, better than expected. Lighter than my old mouse shaped for right handed use. The ambidextrous design on the model-O is comfortable and has a nice matte surface. The skates/glides underneath keep mouse contact placement smoother. Battery life is also good, would recommend.

The media could not be loaded. Me gustó este ratón que es muy ligero para usar y es de tamaño recomendado para manos grandes, puedes configurarlo con el software del fabricante además de actualizarlo, también puede seguir usándolo mientras carga conectando su cable USB CAdemás me lo encontré en oferta de Amazon Renewed en casi 900 pesos que comparado contra el precio real pues si es una buena oferta.
melhor custo beneficio pra mim, peguei promo da amazon, chegou muito antes do previsto mesmo vindo do EUA, mouse excelente para jogar, confortável e qualidade absurda.

¡Bienvenidos jugadores! Hoy estoy emocionado de compartir con ustedes mi opinión sobre el ratón gaming con orificios en el agarre que he estado usando recientemente. Este ratón es verdaderamente impresionante y ha mejorado significativamente mi experiencia de juego.Para empezar, el diseño del ratón con los orificios en el agarre es extremadamente cómodo y ergonómico. Los orificios permiten que el aire circule y reduzcan la acumulación de sudor, lo que significa que puedo jugar durante horas sin sentir incomodidad en mis manos. Además, el ratón es ligero y fácil de controlar, lo que lo hace perfecto para juegos de ritmo rápido.Otra característica que me encanta de este ratón es su precisión. El sensor óptico de alta calidad y el ajuste de DPI personalizable aseguran que mis movimientos sean precisos y precisos. Esto es especialmente importante en juegos donde cada milisegundo cuenta, como en los juegos de disparos en primera persona o en los juegos de estrategia.También debo mencionar que el software del ratón es fácil de usar y personalizar. Puedo personalizar fácilmente los botones y los ajustes de DPI para adaptarse a mis necesidades en diferentes juegos, lo que me permite tener una ventaja competitiva en línea.En general, estoy extremadamente satisfecho con mi compra de este ratón gaming con orificios en el agarre. Es cómodo, preciso y fácil de personalizar, lo que lo convierte en un excelente complemento para cualquier configuración de juego. ¡Le doy cinco estrellas y lo recomendaría a cualquier jugador serio!
